name: Just Roll with It (itch) (ImpossibleStudios)
description:
You play as a ball, who just can stop rolling. But the bumpy terrain is dangerously  in your way. Jump and dash to get to the end of the map. I had to make the game in one day, since I had a vacation planned during the Mini Jam this is for, so there may be bugs, just please report them and I'll attempt to fix.

W - Jump

A - Slow Down

D - Dash

X to use invincibility when bought

You can customize your ball with 5 different unique colors, double jump, dash, and get a hi-score! All of your scores and data are saved across your device, so theres no need to play in one go. You can even use coins collected on your way to buy upgrades like Invincibility and a temporary triple jump!
